data.message: My sister's facebook acount is hacked, how can she recover it? Pls help...

replies.message: Hi Mona. If your sister thinks her account was taken over by someone else, we can help her secure it. This process can also help if your account or computer has been affected by a virus or malware. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1r3wB8L -Chantal
I can't read the instructions at all..the language (looks like "computer lingo".

Same situation has a friend of mine, a friend hacked his account.  I think the best way to protect an account is to make it private, and non public..This way we can control who is trying to access to our personal information. Never I share passwords and anything.  I am very skeptic, because we may see faces, never we can see hearts..I do not trust even in my own shadow.
